cast.name: 杰拉尔丁·黑克威尔 Geraldine Hakewill
凯瑟琳·麦克克莱门茨 Catherine McClements

writer.name: 黛博拉·考克斯 Deborah Cox

this_title: Ms Fisher's Modern Murder Mysteries Season 1
trans_title: 新费雪小姐探案集 第一季
introduction: Set in swinging '60s Melbourne, the gorgeously reckless Peregrine Fisher inherits a windfall when the famous aunt she never knew, Phryne Fisher, goes missing over the highlands of New Guinea. Peregrine sets out to become a world-class private detective in her own right with the unerring guidance of The Adventuresses' Club, a group of exceptional women of which her celebrated aunt was a member. A natural rule breaker, Peregrine is fearless, fun, and charmingly down-to-earth. Despite failing at a number of jobs - hairdresser, typist and sales girl - her survival instincts have kept her afloat. Armed with an impressive collection of life skills and having recently lost her dependent mother, Peregrine is perfectly poised for a new and challenging life and looking for a sense of belonging. She's a self-starter with an innate curiosity, moral integrity and an acute sense of justice; all of which delivers her an instinct for
chinese_title: 新费雪小姐探案集 第一季
foreign_title: Ms Fisher's Modern Murder Mysteries Season 1
